resources.string:
Dear Printoid developer,

 Following is my own configuration:

 - Device model: %1$s
 - Android version: %2$s
 - Fingerprint: %3$s
 - 3D Printer: %4$s

 - OctoPrint version: %5$s

 My message:



 %6$s



 Best regards

Before contacting the developer, are you sure that:

 - Printoid is up-to-date ?
 - You have read the tutorials again?
 - You have searched in the Frequently Asked Questions (F.A.Q.)?
 - You will be polite and courteous?

 If you do not respect these conditions, the developer will not be able to help you his best.

Before sending the logs the developer, are you sure that:
 - Printoid is up-to-date ?
 - You have read the tutorials again?
 - You have search in the Frequently Asked Questions (F.A.Q.)?
 - You will be able to explain why you are sending the traces ?
 - You will be polite and courteous?

 If you do not respect these conditions, the developer will not be able to help you his best.
